response.overview: Bounty hunter Bucum Jackson teams with the small-time con artist, Reggie Wright, that he is pursuing, in an attempt to locate a missing stash of diamonds and a lottery ticket worth millions of dollars. Bucum and Reggie find themselves in a race to the finish as they embark on an unlikely partnership that should -- when all is said and done -- prove beneficial to them both.
response.tagline: Money can make people do funny things.
response.title: All About the Benjamins

crew.name: Jody Levin
crew.job: Executive In Charge Of Post Production

results.name: All About the Benjamins movie trailer.
